channel.title: Connecting with my client from my server to a different server
channel.description: How can I connect with my client from my server to different server? When I connect now it gives the error "Error connecting to the server".

item.title: Connecting with my client from my server to a different server

item.description:

How can I connect with my client from my server to different server?
When I connect now it gives the error “Error connecting to the server”.
